src:
Pátrali po svadobnom prsteni, namiesto neho našli 500-ročné mince ohromnej hodnoty
Nález sa podaril počas dovolenky u kamaráta farmára.
07 Nov 2019, 12:07 by BELFAST/rd
Záchranná akcia sa skončila veľmi nečakane. Dvojica mužov počas hľadania svadobného prsteňa objavila hromadu starých a veľmi vzácnych mincí. Píše The Sun.
Paul Raynard (44) začal plakať od šťastia po tom, čo sa mu s detektorom kovov podarilo nájsť v zemi 84 mincí, pravdepodobne z obdobia okolo roku 1500, keď v Británii vládol kráľ Henrich VIII.
Predpokladaná cena tohto nálezu prekročila 100-tisíc libier, teda v prepočte viac ako 116-tisíc eur. Ihneď po náleze utekal ku svojmu kamarátovi Michaelovi Gwynnovi a kričal: „To je moment, o ktorom sme vždy snívali."


Paul práve našiel mince. Foto: Profimedia.sk  

„Bol to skvelý pocit. Prirovnal by som to k lotérii, keď si kontrolujete čísla a zrazu zistíte, že vám to vyšlo. Triasol som sa, nemohol som tomu uveriť," hovorí na margo senzačného nálezu Paul, otec dvoch detí.
Mužom sa tento nález podaril v severoírskom Ballycastle počas dovolenky u svojho kamaráta farmára. Ten ich požiadal, či by mu pomohli nájsť svadobný prsteň, ktorý stratil na jednom zo svojich polí. Ten sa im síce nájsť nepodarilo, ale nový úlovok ich potešil viac.
text:
They searched for the wedding ring, finding 500-year coins of great value instead
The finding was made during a holiday with a friend of the farmer.
07 Nov 2019, 12:07 by BELFAST / rd
The rescue operation ended very unexpectedly. A pair of men discovered a pile of old and very rare coins while searching for the wedding ring. He writes The Sun.
Paul Raynard (44) began crying with luck after he found 84 coins with a metal detector, probably from around 1500, when King Henry VIII ruled Britain.
The estimated price of this finding exceeded £ 100,000, or more than € 116,000. Immediately after his finding, he fled to his friend Michael Gwynn and shouted, "That's the moment we always dreamed of."


Paul just found the coins. Foto: Profimedia.sk

“It was a great feeling. I would compare it to a lottery when you check the numbers and suddenly find that you have worked out. I was shaking, I couldn't believe it, "says Paul, the father of two children, on a sensational finding.
Men found this finding in Ballycastle, Northern Ireland during a holiday with their farmer friend. He asked them to help him find the wedding ring he had lost in one of his fields. They could not find them, but the new catch pleased them more.
